titleStmt.title: The speech of the President de la Tour, envoy extraordinary from His Royal Highness the Duke of Savoy to His Majesty at his first publick audience Novemb. 2, 1690.
titleStmt.author: La Tour, Filliberto Sallier de.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
